name: Password Generator
description: An app that randomly generates a password based on length and character type.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A 5-day forecast app that shows temperature, humidity, precipitation, and UV-index.

name: Template Engine
description: A command line interface that allows the user to generate a card based on inquirer prompt data.

name: Note Taker
description: A note-taking app that allows the user to write, edit, and delete their notes.

name: Procrasti-Dater
description: This app provides the location of restaurants based on user-selected cuisine and radius relative to their date location.

name: Jinji
description: This app was designed to be used by HR professionals to allow them access to an employee database in SQL.
